Package com.github.glusk2.sprouts.core.geom

Geometry package for the Sprouts game.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Curve<T extends Path<Vector2>>
    Represents a curve in a 2-dimensional space as a list of splines.
    Polyline
    Straight line segments connecting neighbouring Polyline.points() in a 2-dimensional space.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BezierCurve
    A Curve implementation that interpolates the sample using Bezier splines.
    BSplineControlPoints
    A B-Spline control points polyline.
    CachedCurve
    A Curve decorator that caches the original list of splines.
    CurveApproximation
    Polyline approximation of a curve.
    IsPointOnLineSegment
    This class represents a check that tests whether the point lies on a line segment.
    PerpDistSimpl
    A perpendicular distance polyline simplification.
    Polyline.WrappedList
    A wrapper class for a list of points.
    PolylineBatch
    A Polyline RenderBatch.
    PolylinePiece
    A PolylinePiece is a piece of the original Polyline, that is cut in two at the cuttingPoint.
    TrimmedPolyline
    A TrimmedPolyline is a Polyline without the first few points of original.

Package com.github.glusk2.sprouts.core.geom Description

Geometry package for the Sprouts game.
